ygData.subject: The Big Question...
ygData.msgSnippet: Technosis had fear in her eyes. Psuedo seen it. Oh, no. What is wrong? Psuedo asked. Nothing, just the way Serge looked at me earlier. If it wasn t for me,

	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Technosis had fear in her eyes. Psuedo seen it.

"Oh, no. What is wrong?" P=
suedo asked.

"Nothing, just the way Serge looked at me earlier. If it wasn=
't for me, the Predacons would still have Weight with them." Technosis said=
. She leaned up against a rock, and suddenly looked angry. She was angry at=
 herself.

"It wasn't your fault." Atmaa says.

"Yes it was, Weight was try=
ing to protect me." Technosis snapped back.

"Uhh, I'm sure that Weight is =
in a better place." Psuedo says.

"Yeah, in Serge's gut." Technosis says.

=
"No, the Matrix, where all good bots go when they die." Psuedo says.

"WHat=
 makes you think he's dead? Maybe he's just sitting in the pit of Serge's s=
tomach slowly dying of mech fluid loss." Technosis says.

"Oh, sorry." Psue=
do says. Technosis doesn't answer.

"Don't do that to me, I love you!" Psue=
do says.

"Weight didn't get such a luxury." Technsois says.

"Weight...no,=
 that won't work." Atma says.

"Technosis, I care about you, I don't want y=
ou fretting over that kind of thing! You are innocent, you did nothing!" Ps=
uedo says.

"I seen Tesifier, too, he's my brother and he didn't leave Deem=
os' twisted group to come back to me." Technosis said. She cried without a =
sound.

"Technosis, dry those tears up, I exist to make you happy! Will you=
 marry me?" Psuedo says. He falls to his knees. He had to ring to give, he =
knew his love would do.

"Yes..." Technosis whispered. She was still crying=
.

"Thank you, you mean everything to me!" Psuedo says.

"We will get marri=
ed back on Cybertron. Do you like kids?" Technosis asked.

"I love them, an=
ything you love, I can handle anyhow!" Psuedo says.

"Why wait till you get=
 back on Cybertron? We have a judge right here." Atma says. They both look =
at Atma.

"I sentenced Mobster to 30 years." Atma says. Atma laughs as he s=
ees the twinkle in Psuedo and Technosis' eyes. Technsois remembered KitKat'=
s words, how she would one die find another lover to try her best to replac=
e Time Bomb. She has, and she couldn't help but miss KitKat, and wondered i=
f she would ever see her again...

OOC: No imatation here, ask Zardus, I as=
ked him if it was okay weeks ago, this was planned for a long time! Ever si=
nce Psuedo brought Technosis back to life, which I did because I missed her=
 terribly...
